tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_nomads_photos (
    photo_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    photo_name VARCHAR(255),
    upload_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    photographer_name VARCHAR(150),
    category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TravelMedia (
    media_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT,
    media_type VARCHAR(20),
    media_url VARCHAR(200),
    media_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES Travelers(traveler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Photos (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date_taken DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Videos (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE Tags (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE photo_tags (
    photo_id INT,
    tag_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (photo_id, tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (photo_id) REFERENCES photos(photo_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE photos (photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  photo_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  taken_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE videos (video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  video_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  taken_date DATE,
  duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE countries (country_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  continent VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE cities (city_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  country_id INT,
  population INT
)

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  registration_date DATE
)
